function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Connection loss due to low wifi signal","category":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and ventilation control in winter and summer","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to sensor malfunction or misconfiguration","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction of safe pedestrian routes in a covid-19 pandemic context","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inferencing occupation level of amenities through rule-based system approach","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate modeling of population behavior and characteristics","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of control over the types of groups occupying different amenities","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Representation of the city’s physical environment for navigation","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of nodes in the surroundings of amenities can lead to the propagation of contagious diseases if these nodes are in close proximity to infected individuals or high-risk areas.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of components in the architecture may lead to software bugs and errors that could impact the safe navigation service.","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The service may fail to adequately communicate the limitations of safe routes and the possibility of unavoidable exposure to dangerous areas.","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased evaluation scenarios may result in inaccurate performance assessment of the navigation service","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Situations where people are in close proximity in planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate updating of the danger model leading to incorrect risk assessment for different scenarios.","category":"Poor urban
